page.title: 18CURRENT AFFAIRS; OPINION
page.content:
IF I WAS IN CHARGE
If I was in charge I would stop all countries using the H bomb. I would stop all people using the H bomb because they make too much damage and the people have no reason for using it. Also they don't need to fight.
I would make children warm when they go to bed and not hungry because otherwise they will die and be ill. Back in England or other countries some people eat for the sake of eating.
I would stop people killing animals because they kill them for no reason and they could eat other things than animals.
Boxgrove School Age 10 yrs.
